net.wstech2.me.httpsclient

Class CertificateValidatorUtils

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.wstech2.me.httpsclient.CertificateValidatorUtils

  • public class CertificateValidatorUtils
extends java.lang.Object
    A collection of static, state independent, auxiliary methods to support the execution of common tasks.

    • Method Detail

      • printCertificateDetails

        public static void printCertificateDetails(org.bouncycastle.asn1.x509.Certificate cert)
        Prints common certificate informations like signature, signature algorithm, subject and issuer details, etc.
        Parameters:
        cert - The X509CertificateStructure containing the information that will be printed.

      • dumpCertificateInfo

        public static void dumpCertificateInfo(org.bouncycastle.asn1.x509.Certificate cert)
        Inspected and display various informations from the Certificate passed as parameter. Keys are presented in HEX values and ASN1 structures dumped using ASN1Dump.dumpAsString. This method is intended for debug purposes only.
        Parameters:
        cert - The X509CertificateStructure to be inspected.

      • getDigestInstance

        public static org.bouncycastle.crypto.ExtendedDigest getDigestInstance(org.bouncycastle.asn1.x509.Certificate cert)
        Obtains the digest instance corresponding to the Signature Algorithm OID stored within the X509CertificateStructure @cert parameter.
        Parameters:
        cert - The X509CertificateStructure to be analyzed.
        Returns:
        A Digest (SHA1Digest, MD5Digest, etc.) instance. Null if no digest corresponding to the OID could be found.

      • getDateFromX509Time

        public static java.util.Date getDateFromX509Time(org.bouncycastle.asn1.x509.Time time)
        Receives an org.bouncycastle.asn1.x509.Time returning a java.util.Date instance corresponding to the same timestamp as the org.bouncycastle.asn1.x509.Time informed.
        Parameters:
        time - An instance of org.bouncycastle.asn1.x509.Time containing a given Date.
        Returns:
        An instance of java.util.Date representing the same timestamp from time.

      • extractCommonName

        public static java.lang.String extractCommonName(org.bouncycastle.asn1.x509.Certificate cert)
        Extracts and returns a java.lang.String corresponding to the common name of the subject from the certificate cert.
        Parameters:
        cert - The certificate from which the subject's common name is to be extracted.
        Returns:
        A string corresponding to the certificate subject's common name.

      • extractIssuerName

        public static java.lang.String extractIssuerName(org.bouncycastle.asn1.x509.Certificate cert)
        Retrieves the issuer common name.
        Parameters:
        cert - The certificate from which the issuer name is to the extracted.
        Returns:
        The issuer common name.

      • getCertInfoMap

        public static java.util.Hashtable getCertInfoMap(org.bouncycastle.asn1.x509.Certificate[] certs)
        Creates a Hashtable containing information (common name, issuer cn, purpose, etc.) about all chain certificates.
        Parameters:
        certs - Certificates to be processed.
        Returns:
        a Hashtable containing information about all certificates ordered by common name.

      • getServerCertificateInfo

        public static java.util.Hashtable getServerCertificateInfo(java.util.Hashtable certInfos)
        Get the certificate info hashtable corresponding to the server certificate. Not the C.A. certificates, if any.
        Parameters:
        certInfos - The same hashtable generated by getCertInfoMap(Certificate[]).
        Returns:
        Server certificate Hashtable info.

      • getCertificateFromJarOrRecordStore

        public static org.bouncycastle.asn1.x509.Certificate getCertificateFromJarOrRecordStore(java.lang.String cn)
                                                                                 throws javax.microedition.rms.RecordStoreNotOpenException,
                                                                                        javax.microedition.rms.InvalidRecordIDException,
                                                                                        javax.microedition.rms.RecordStoreException,
                                                                                        java.io.IOException
        Loads a certificate either from the device record store or from the application jar.
        Parameters:
        cn - The common name attribute identifying the certificate.
        Returns:
        An instance of org.bouncycastle.asn1.x509.Certificate corresponding to the certificate loaded or null if a certificate was not found.
        Throws:
        javax.microedition.rms.RecordStoreNotOpenException
        javax.microedition.rms.InvalidRecordIDException
        javax.microedition.rms.RecordStoreException
        java.io.IOException

      • loadJarResource

        public static byte[] loadJarResource(java.lang.String filename)
                              throws java.io.IOException
        Loads a file from the application jar.
        Parameters:
        filename - The fullpath of the resource at the jar file.
        Returns:
        A byte array containing the file loaded.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException
